attributes.action: The media should cover peaceful protests properly
attributes.additional_details: The anti capitalism protests are an example of a peaceful protest. We know they are protesting, we know they are peaceful but many of us aren't exactly sure about WHY they are protesting, I think the media only really cares about covering the violent protests and they should be motivated to properly cover the real protesters instead of effectively encouraging violent protests by making it look like it's the only way the public's concerns will be heard.
